pages.text: The $(marked)Golden Coronation$() is an essential part of ascension. It is used to summon a $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:bestiary/prince)Tattered Prince$() from the depths of $(marked)Carcosa$().$(br)The rite will require four loyal $(ml:bestiary/serfs)Serfs$() nearby, as well as $(ml:miskatonicmysteries:world/occult_knowledge)their secret$(). These Serfs are usually manually recruited, but they can also just think very highly of you.$(br)Once started, the rite will require a sufficient sacrifice to establish a connection.
We recommend using a Sheep or a Pig rather than a Villager, as Serfs are not very enthusiastic about manslaughter.
